item.title: The obstacles to put Istio into production and how we solve them
item.description: What is service mesh? Service mesh is becoming yet another fancy name in the cloud-native world this year. What exactly it is? By definition, service mesh is a dedicated infrastructure layer for handling service-to-service communication. It’s responsible for the reliable delivery of requests through the complex topology of services that comprise a modern, cloud-native application.
